description: React component for an internship offer letter page with signature upload, PDF export, and navigation features.

methods.name: loadLocal
methods.description: Loads signature data from local storage.

methods.name: saveLocal
methods.description: Saves signature data to local storage.

methods.name: handleFileChange
methods.description: Handles signature image file selection, validation, and preview.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Validates signature presence, marks document as complete, and navigates to /documents.

methods.name: ensurePdfLibs
methods.description: Dynamically imports html2canvas and jsPDF libraries for PDF generation.

methods.name: handleExportPdf
methods.description: Generates PDF of the offer letter with signature, with fallback to print if PDF generation fails.
